scripts.build: cd ../ck-observable-domain && tsc && echo 'ck-observable-domain built.'  && cd ../ck-observable-domain-mqtt && echo 'ck-observable-domain-mqtt built.'&& tsc && cd ../ck-observable-domain-signalr && echo 'ck-observable-domain-signalr built.'&& tsc && cd ../ck-observable-domain-demo && tsc --noEmit && parcel build && echo 'ck-observable-domain-demo built.'
